    • Method Detail

      • fetchResource

        public static Uri fetchResource​(String volumeName,
                                long playlistId)
        Obtains a URI in dataability:// format, which is used for processing information about members of the audio playback list subdirectory.
        Parameters:
        volumeName - Indicates the database volume name.
        playlistId - Indicates the playback list ID.
        Returns:
        Returns the URI.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Throws this exception if the database volume name is null.
        Since:
        3

      • updatePlaylistItem

        public static boolean updatePlaylistItem​(DataAbilityHelper dataAbilityHelper,
                                         long playlistId,
                                         int oldLocation,
                                         int newLocation)
        Moves the playback list to a new storage position.
        Parameters:
        dataAbilityHelper - Indicates the dataAbilityHelper instance for data operations.
        playlistId - Indicates the playback list ID.
        oldLocation - Indicates the original storage position of the playback list.
        newLocation - Indicates the target storage position of the playback list.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the operation is successfully; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        3
